original_title: ポルノ・レポート　金髪パンマ
overview: There is a panma -- the word "panma" is a combination of "panpan" (prostitute) and "anma" (a traditional Japanese masseuse) -- shop that dispatches prostitutes disguised as female masseuses to inns. However, the woman that was the main earner quits, and the man in charge is at a loss. At that time, he meets a white woman, Janet, and the manager scouts her. He's going to sell her as Japan's first blonde panma.
title: Poruno repōto: Kinpatsu panma
